video.title: Dragon Tales
video.synopsis: Siblings Emmy and Max travel to Dragon Land, where their colorful new friends help them find the solutions to real-life problems.

episodes.synopsis: Emmy and Max go to Dragon Land and learn about a special mission. / Zak shows Ord that even a little light takes the darkness away.
episodes.title: To Fly with Dragons / The Forest of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Ord won't share his cupcake... or anything else. / Cassie fears that her pet caterpoozle has died when Max finds a transparent cocoon in its cage.
episodes.title: To Kingdom Come / Goodbye Little Caterpoozle

episodes.synopsis: Emmy and Max must help find a merry-go-round pony named Whinni, who has wandered away. / Ord's friends avoid him on his birthday.
episodes.title: Knot a Problem / Ord's Unhappy Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Emmy is upset when she loses a soccer game and decides that she's never going to play again. / Zak is scared of going to the doctor.
episodes.title: Tails You Lose / Calling Dr. Zak

episodes.synopsis: The group sets off to Rainbow Canyon to find colors to paint with. / Zak's afraid that Wheezie will scare the Do-Re-Mi birds with her loud racket.
episodes.title: Pigment of Imagination / Zak's Song

episodes.synopsis: Quetzal is taking Max and Emmy to Snowy Summit. / Max gets mad over a high-flying game of dragon tag.
episodes.title: Snow Dragons / The Fury Is Out on This One

episodes.synopsis: Zak and Wheezie are performing in a big Dragon Land concert, but find themselves bickering over song choice. / Zak and Wheezie are having a sleepover.
episodes.title: The Giant of Nod / The Big Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: Ord's looking for giggle flowers; they're his mom's favorite and he wants them for her birthday. / The dragons are having a talent show.
episodes.title: A Picture's Worth a Thousand Words / The Talent Pool

episodes.synopsis: The gang decides to build a tree house in the branches of Sid Sycamore. / Ord finds himself too big for a sailing adventure in Dragon Land.
episodes.title: Emmy's Dreamhouse / Dragon Sales

episodes.synopsis: Cyrus the sneaky serpent swipes a Rhyme Bird egg. / On a rainy day, Max and Emmy visit Dragon Land for some fun biking.
episodes.title: Eggs Over Easy / A Liking to Biking

episodes.synopsis: A puppet show runs into trouble when Emmy, Zak and Wheezie all want the same part. / Max, Emmy and the dragons perform "The Three Little Pigs."
episodes.title: Sky Pirates / Four Little Pigs

episodes.synopsis: The Do-Re-Mi birds are gone, and Zak and Wheezie are afraid something bad has happened! / Cassie has some Jingle Flowers that need special water.
episodes.title: Zak and the Beanstalk / Feat on Her Feet

episodes.synopsis: Zak and Wheezie are growing quite irritated with each other. / Proper planning is an issue when our friends want to create a kite for Quetzal.
episodes.title: Not a Separated at Birth / Kite for Quetzal

episodes.synopsis: Zak and Wheezie want to play Sackberry Toss, but they don't know how to catch. / Cassie is upset when she's not chosen to be in the big parade.
episodes.title: Dragon Drop / Cassie Loves a Parade

episodes.synopsis: Max is scared to go to his new school. / Max shows the dragons his 3D Mondo Mouse comic book, which contains mysterious signs.
episodes.title: A Cool School / Max's Comic Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Ord is afraid to go back to sleep after having a nightmare. / When the rain washes away all the color, everyone has to recolor everything.
episodes.title: It Happened One Nightmare / Staying Within the Lines

episodes.synopsis: The gang is playing a game of Whack-It-Back when Ord accidentally loses the whistler. / Emmy accidentally breaks Wheezie's trumpet.
episodes.title: Follow the Dots / A Smashing Success

episodes.synopsis: Zak wants the rare Jugglebug for school sharing time. / Emmy and Max are greeted by a strange orange furball: Zak and Wheezie's new pet.
episodes.title: Quibbling Siblings / Wheezie's Hairball

episodes.synopsis: Max is tired of being short and wishes he were taller. / It's Ord's birthday, and the gang goes to a playground in the clouds to celebrate.
episodes.title: A Tall Tale / Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy, Ord and Cassie meet a whistling wind named Windy. / Max gets mad when he doesn't get his way in a kickball game.
episodes.title: Blowin' in the Wind / No Hitter

episodes.synopsis: Max accidentally breaks Emmy's yo-yo after he was told not to touch it. / The gang goes on a treasure hunt in Dragon Land.
episodes.title: Do Not Pass Gnome / Treasure Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Quetzal gives the gang some jumping beans to return to his brother. / Emmy thinks her carrot seedlings are growing too slowly.
episodes.title: The Jumping Bean Express / Get Offa My Cloud

episodes.synopsis: Music sparkles rain down on Dragon Land. / A game sends Max, Emmy and the dragons scrambling into a dark cave.
episodes.title: Backwards to Forwards / Sounds Like Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Max plays on a slide made out of pillows. / Max and Emmy put on their boots and go outside to jump in the puddles.
episodes.title: Greatest Show in Dragon Land / Prepare According to Instructions

episodes.synopsis: Max wants to play soccer. Emmy says they can play in Dragon Land! / Max grows attached to a frog that he finds in Dragoon Lagoon.
episodes.title: Wheezie's Last Laugh / Frog Prints

episodes.synopsis: At a big race in Dragon Land, Wheezie and Zak crash into a muddy creek. / Max and Emmy head to Dragon Land to help make a cake for a baking contest.
episodes.title: Crash Landings / The Big Cake Mixup

episodes.synopsis: The gang uses Quetzal's magic book to make up stories. / When Emmy and Max arrive in snowy Dragon Land, Max meets a talking snowman.
episodes.title: Quetzal's Magic Pop Up Book / My Way or Snow Way

episodes.synopsis: The kids and dragons build sandcastles so the Turtle Dragons can lay their eggs. / Max, Emmy and the dragons have a fun time painting.
episodes.title: Sand Castle Hassle / True Blue Friend

episodes.synopsis: Zak has never been swimming before and he's scared. / The weather in Dragon Land is very strange!
episodes.title: Zak Takes a Dive / Under the Weather

episodes.synopsis: Max is summoned to Dragon Land while Emmy is off at the store. / Wheezie encounters a flower that causes her fire breath to turn to fire smoke.
episodes.title: My Emmy or Bust / Light My Firebreath

episodes.synopsis: Emmy declares that Max is jinxed. / Quetzal finds a magic carpet while doing some spring cleaning.
episodes.title: Follow the Leader / Max and the Magic Carpet

episodes.synopsis: A jump rope takes on a life of its own! / Everyone joins together to help Cassie baby-sit.
episodes.title: Rope Trick / Baby Troubles

episodes.synopsis: Max is practicing to drive the bumper cars at Funland, but Emmy's not sure if she'll be tall enough. / Emmy is taking forever to tie her shoes.
episodes.title: Small Time / Roller Coaster Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Ord accidentally gets trapped inside a humongous bubble! / When Emmy is annoyed by Max's silliness, they both seek a respite in Dragon Land.
episodes.title: Up, Up, & Away / Wild Time

episodes.synopsis: Cassie discovers a magic crayon that everybody wants, but no one wants to share it. / Quetzal loves to make music with maracas.
episodes.title: Bad Share Day / Whole Lotta Maracas Goin' On

episodes.synopsis: Max and his friends search for Max's frog friend, Hoppy, in a dark cave. / The gang meets a new dragon, Priscilla, who has rather large feathers.
episodes.title: Ord Sees the Light / The Ugly Dragling

episodes.synopsis: Zak has a big surprise for Wheezie, but she's not happy. / Emmy is using her dad's video camera, and Emmy and Max take the camera to Dragon Land.
episodes.title: Out with the Garbage / Lights, Camera, Dragons

episodes.synopsis: Get to the bottom of what's really bothering a scaly green meanie. / The kids and dragons spot Captain Scaliwag's pirate ship.
episodes.title: Bully for You / The Great White Cloud Whale

episodes.synopsis: Cassie, the dragons, Emmy and Max lose their ball in the belly of a Dragonocerous. / Max accidentally breaks the Nodlings' wagon.
episodes.title: To Do or Not to Do / Much Ado About Nodlings

episodes.synopsis: Everybody in the gang is impressed with Quetzal's amazing butterfly collection. / Max has trouble swinging on the monkey bars.
episodes.title: Don't Bug Me / Over and Over

episodes.synopsis: When Max gets to Dragon Land, he finds Ord's lucky stone. / The dragons have built a new obstacle course, and everyone wants to try it out right away.
episodes.title: Lucky Stone / The Mefirst Wizard

episodes.synopsis: Ord faces his fear of the darkness once again when he's stuck in a dark cave. / Cassie can't seem to win a prize at the Dragon Land fair.
episodes.title: Cassie Catches Up / Very Berry

episodes.synopsis: Max and Emmy are excited to get to Dragon Land, as today is the big opening of the Dragon Land Aquarium. / Max and Emmy are playing dress-up.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers / Remember the Pillow Fort

episodes.synopsis: Ord is sad because he's lost his favorite blanket. / Max wants to do everything his way, but as far as Emmy's concerned, it's not the right way.
episodes.title: Big Funky Cloud / Copy Cat

episodes.synopsis: After a bad experience in a baseball game, Max wishes that he could be bigger. / Max and Ord argue while working on a project together.
episodes.title: One Big Wish / Breaking Up Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: The gang meets a new dragon who uses a wheelchair to get around. / Emmy brings a pomegranate to show and tell.
episodes.title: A New Friend / Have No Fear

episodes.synopsis: Emmy and Max are eager to go to Dragon Land because Cassie said that she was bringing a surprise. / Max, Emmy and Enrique don't have school today.
episodes.title: Cassie, the Green-Eyed Dragon / Something's Missing

episodes.synopsis: Emmy and Max are going to watch Princess Kidoodle be crowned queen of the doodle fairies. / Emmy is eager to go to Dragon Land to pick crystals.
episodes.title: A Crown for Princess Kidoodle / Three's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Emmy and Cassie find themselves lost in a series of tunnels. / Max, Emmy and the dragons accidentally ruin a giant dessert that Mungus made.
episodes.title: Knuck Knuck, Who's There? / Just Desserts

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes dragonberry picking but can't find any berries! / A mysterious weather problem is putting Chilly the snowman and his dog in danger.
episodes.title: Dragonberry Drought / A Snowman for All Seasons

episodes.synopsis: Cassie wants to try out for a school play. / Emmy finds a baby bird. She grows attached to it and has a hard time letting go.
episodes.title: I Believe in Me / Bye, Bye Baby Birdie

episodes.synopsis: Cassie's little sister and brother are getting tired of the same old stories. / Emmy is invited to become part of a dragon Girl Scout group.
episodes.title: Back to the Storybook / Dragon Scouts

episodes.synopsis: Max and Emmy have a new detective kit. / Quetzal enlists the gang to help bring some soup to his sick brother.
episodes.title: The Serpent's Trail / Head Over Heels

episodes.synopsis: Max accidentally lets a baby pig get out. / Max, Emmy and the dragons find a baby flower in need of help.
episodes.title: Sticky Situations / Green Thumbs

episodes.synopsis: Emmy, Max and the dragons are playing dragon basketball. / Zak and Wheezie have a smelly problem: They've been sprayed by a Stinkydink bug.
episodes.title: Teasing Is Not Pleasing / Team Work

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's invited to Willie the Snow Seal's birthday. / Zak has a new dragondisk that needs cleaning.
episodes.title: On Thin Ice / The Shape of Things to Come

episodes.synopsis: Ord is not good at hide-and-seek and finds himself not enjoying the Doodle Fairies' game of it. / On Quetzal's birthday, Max is eager to celebrate.
episodes.title: Hide and Can't Seek / The Art of Patience

episodes.synopsis: Zak and Wheezie are practicing for a talent show. / On Dragontines Day, everyone celebrates with a special dance, but Ord can't seem to do the moves.
episodes.title: So Long Solo / Hands Together

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy and the dragons are out flying kites. / Zak is scared of the fast new rides at the Dragon Land amusement park.
episodes.title: Sneezy Does It / Try It, You'll Like It

episodes.synopsis: Cassie, Emmy and the dragons team up to find eggs in a special Dragon Land egg hunt. / The dragons, Max and Emmy are all invited to Spike's fiesta.
episodes.title: Just for Laughs / Give Zak a Hand

episodes.synopsis: Max is elated when he lands the lead in the school play. / Emmy takes her new skateboard to Dragon Land, where Ord wants to try it.
episodes.title: Make No Mistake / The Balancing Act

episodes.synopsis: Cassie's family is about to hatch a couple more eggs and she has to move out of her room. / Emmy is making things out of clay and having a good time.
episodes.title: Room for Change / The Sorrow and the Party

episodes.synopsis: Wheezie carelessly breaks Zak's treasured snoot flute. / Emmy and Max visit the brand-new attraction at the Dragon Land amusement park: a funhouse.
episodes.title: The Grudge Won't Budge / Putting the Fun in Fun Houses

episodes.synopsis: Max and Emmy try to help the dragons find their way out of a forest. / Wheezie opens a music box that causes her and Zak to start dancing.
episodes.title: Puzzlewood / Let's Dance

episodes.synopsis: Max and Emmy have a new neighbor, Enrique. After thinking it over for a bit, Max and Emmy decide to introduce him to Dragon Land.
episodes.title: To Fly with a New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Max wants to see the Bursting Blossoms blooming! / Enrique arrives one warm spring day to find Max and Emmy in their winter clothes!
episodes.title: Rise and Bloom / Super Snow Day

episodes.synopsis: Max teaches Zak and Wheezie a song to perform for Princess Kidoodle. / Max and Emmy's arguing upsets Enrique, so he goes to the magical wishing well.
episodes.title: Musical Scales / Hand in Hand

episodes.synopsis: Ord and the other dragons are trying out for the sky soccer team. Ord doesn't do very well and tries to quit. / The Junior Unicorn Race is in peril.
episodes.title: Sky Soccer / Making It Fun

episodes.synopsis: Our friends have a fun game of card-house building in mind, but a giant earthquake puts an end to it. / It's time for the Dragon Land Road Race.
episodes.title: Itching for a Cure / The Big Race

episodes.synopsis: While rummaging through a Cave Swap, Wheezie is astounded by a golden statue. / Cassie, Emmy and the dragons team up for a custard egg hunt.
episodes.title: Flip Flop / Just for Laughs

episodes.synopsis: When Max gets to Dragon Land, he finds Ord's lucky stone. / Max has been anticipating riding the Dragonland Express for days.
episodes.title: Lucky Stone / Max Loves a Train

episodes.synopsis: The gang meets a new dragon, Lorca, who uses a wheelchair to get around. / Enrique arrives just in time to help out with El Dia del Maestro.
episodes.title: A New Friend / El Dia del Maestro

episodes.synopsis: When Cassie's mom accidentally throws Finn's blankie in the laundry, Finn is devastated. / Max and Emmy's mom is baking cookies.
episodes.title: Finn's Blankie / Let's Dance

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy and Enrique must abandon their plans for chalk drawing outside. / A mysterious weather problem is placing Chilly the snowman in danger.
episodes.title: Express Yourself / A Snowman for All Seasons

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy and Enrique join the dragons in heading to the Doodle Fairy Kingdom Flower Festival. / Zak needs a Jugglebug for his talent show act.
episodes.title: Prince for a Day / So Long Solo

episodes.synopsis: Emmy has a brand new skateboard and she's ready to get skating! / On a trip to Dragon Land, Max is paired with Lorca for a scavenger hunt.
episodes.title: The Balancing Act / A Small Victory

episodes.synopsis: Enrique is treated to a surprise birthday party. / Everyone's invited to Willie the Snow Seal's birthday.
episodes.title: Feliz Cumpleaños, Enrique / On Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: Emmy, Max and the dragons are playing dragon basketball. / Emmy, Max and Enrique are going on a sky-sailing adventure.
episodes.title: Teasing Is Not Pleasing / Down the Drain

episodes.synopsis: Quetzal reads a story about El Dorado to the gang. / The gang goes dragonberry picking, but there aren't any dragonberries to be found!
episodes.title: All That Glitters / Dragonberry Drought

episodes.synopsis: Princess Kidoodle is going to be crowned queen of the doodle fairies. / Max, Emmy and Enrique head to Dragon Land for a game of hopscotch.
episodes.title: A Crown for Princess Kidoodle / Play It and Say It

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy and Enrique are called to Dragon Land for a going-away party. / The gang is enlisted by Quetzal to help bring some soup to his sick brother.
episodes.title: Moving On / Head Over Heels

episodes.synopsis: Max wants to play with Emmy and Enrique, but they're working on a project for school. / Zak and Wheezie have been sprayed by a Stinkydink bug.
episodes.title: All Together Now / Team Work

episodes.synopsis: The Junior Unicorn Race is in peril. / Emmy is making things out of clay and having a good time, but Max is moping at the playroom window.
episodes.title: Making It Fun / The Sorrow and the Party

episodes.synopsis: The gang has a fun game of card-house building in mind, but a giant earthquake puts an end to it. / Cassie finds herself having a lack of confidence.
episodes.title: Itching for a Cure / Cassie Catches Up

episodes.synopsis: Celeste, a star, comes down to Dragon Land during the day. / Everyone is excited about the new attractions at the Dragon Land amusement park.
episodes.title: Sad Little Star / Try It, You'll Like It

episodes.synopsis: The time has come for a big race in which people are paired together to race down a course. / Emmy finds a baby bird and grows attached it.
episodes.title: The Big Race / Bye, Bye Baby Birdie

episodes.synopsis: Ord and the other dragons are trying out for sky soccer. / Cassie's upset because she has to move to a new room to make space for two new babies.
episodes.title: Sky Soccer / Room for a Change

episodes.synopsis: Max can't wait to see the Bursting Blossoms blooming! / Emmy is invited to become part of a dragon Girl Scout group.
episodes.title: Rise and Bloom / Dragon Scouts

episodes.synopsis: Max teaches Zak and Wheezie a song to perform for Princess Kidoodle. / Emmy is going to sleep-away camp for a week.
episodes.title: Musical Scales / Something's Missing

episodes.synopsis: Max, Emmy and the dragons find a baby flower in need of help. / Max and Emmy's arguing upsets Enrique, so he goes to the magical wishing well.
episodes.title: Green Thumbs / Hand in Hand

episodes.synopsis: Cassie is bringing a surprise to the School in the Sky. / Max, Emmy and Enrique join the dragons at the School in the Sky.
episodes.title: Cassie, the Green-Eyed Dragon / Hello, Miss Tipps

episodes.synopsis: Enrique arrives one warm spring day to find Max and Emmy in their winter clothes! / Max is afraid of making a mistake in the School in the Sky play.
episodes.title: Super Snow Day / Make No Mistake

episodes.synopsis: Zak and Wheezie discover that two heads are better than one. / Max tackles his fear of riding horses when roving ponies trot into town.
episodes.title: Just the Two of Us / Cowboy Max

episodes.synopsis: Today is the big opening of the Dragon Land Aquarium. / It's time for Quetzal to read from the Magic Story Book, but Enrique has never chosen a story.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers / A Storybook Ending
